structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT

law.catch_line: Junk dealers; local business tax receipt requirements.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-203. Junk dealers; local business tax receipt requirements.
Every person engaged in business as a scrap metal processor as defined in Section 8A-9.1 shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, Section 8A-223.1
Every person engaged in business as a junk dealer as defined in Section 8A-9.1 shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, Section 8A-223.1
